name: Facebook Graph API Tool
semantic_context: Interacts with Facebook using the Graph API
natural_language_description: 这是 Facebook Graph API Tool 节点。主要用于: Interacts with Facebook using the Graph API

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Interacts with Facebook using the Graph API
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Interacts with Facebook using the Graph API | (必填项)

hostUrl.name: hostUrl
hostUrl.description: The Host URL of the request. Almost all requests are passed to the graph.facebook.com host URL. The single exception is video uploads, which use graph-video.facebook.com.
hostUrl.natural_language_description: 参数名: Host URL | 作用: The Host URL of the request. Almost all requests are passed to the graph.facebook.com host URL. The single exception is video uploads, which use graph-video.facebook.com. | 默认值: graph.facebook.com | (必填项)

httpRequestMethod.name: httpRequestMethod
httpRequestMethod.description: The HTTP Method to be used for the request
httpRequestMethod.natural_language_description: 参数名: HTTP Request Method | 作用: The HTTP Method to be used for the request | 默认值: GET | (必填项)

graphApiVersion.name: graphApiVersion
graphApiVersion.description: The version of the Graph API to be used in the request
graphApiVersion.natural_language_description: 参数名: Graph API Version | 作用: The version of the Graph API to be used in the request | (必填项)

node.name: node
node.description: The node on which to operate. A node is an individual object with a unique ID. For example, there are many User node objects, each with a unique ID representing a person on Facebook.
node.natural_language_description: 参数名: Node | 作用: The node on which to operate. A node is an individual object with a unique ID. For example, there are many User node objects, each with a unique ID representing a person on Facebook. | (必填项)

edge.name: edge
edge.description: Edge of the node on which to operate. Edges represent collections of objects which are attached to the node.
edge.natural_language_description: 参数名: Edge | 作用: Edge of the node on which to operate. Edges represent collections of objects which are attached to the node.

allowUnauthorizedCerts.name: allowUnauthorizedCerts
allowUnauthorizedCerts.description: Whether to connect even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
allowUnauthorizedCerts.natural_language_description: 参数名: Ignore SSL Issues (Insecure) | 作用: Whether to connect even if SSL certificate validation is not possible | 默认值: False

sendBinaryData.name: sendBinaryData
sendBinaryData.description: Whether binary data should be sent as body
sendBinaryData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Send Binary File | 作用: Whether binary data should be sent as body | 默认值: False | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: For Form-Data Multipart, they can be provided in the format: `"sendKey1:binaryProperty1,sendKey2:binaryProperty2`
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 作用: For Form-Data Multipart, they can be provided in the format: `"sendKey1:binaryProperty1,sendKey2:binaryProperty2` | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fields (值: None) - The list of fields to request in the GET request
queryParameters (值: None) - The query parameters to send
queryParametersJson (值: None) - The query parameters to send, defined as a JSON object
